channel.title: Comments on: Blizzard to Alchemists: Retrain as Tailors

item.title: By: Alrick
item.dc:creator: Alrick
item.description:
Looks like adding timesinks to me, so that people won't progress too fast. Pots substituted for gear, allowing to try new bosses before farming previous ones through and through. Now raiders will generally spend more time getting gear, making the content last longer. Way to go.
As for re-tuning - don't be silly. They won't touch anything.
item.content:encoded:
Looks like adding timesinks to me, so that people won’t progress too fast. Pots substituted for gear, allowing to try new bosses before farming previous ones through and through. Now raiders will generally spend more time getting gear, making the content last longer. Way to go.

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description:
That better be some serious retuning they do to encounters. They just basically kicked every class in the nuts with those patch notes. Although I guess Beast Mastery specced Hunters got a little love.
Why Blizzard keeps trying to make Hunters use pets in raids, but only take half measures to make pets viable, I will never know. For instance this Avoidance skill will be useless if you havetot get rid of one of your other major defensive focuses up to take it (ie Natural Armor, Greater Stamins, Resistance etc)
